summary: Manages the loading, building, and querying of a vector index of passages, encodes questions, performs similarity search to fetch relevant document embeddings and texts, decodes and post‑processes them, and formats the retrieved context for use with a Retrieval‑Augmented Generation model.
business_intent: Enable retrieval‑augmented generation by supplying relevant external knowledge documents to a language model, improving the factuality and relevance of generated responses.
